page.title: 11ST. MARY'S FARM _IN GENERAL
page.content: Atogether Mr Gough has got 750 acres of which 350 acres is in our Domesday area. St Mary's farm has got 26 acres of grass hop. 70 acres of oil seed rape. 26 acres of grass. 64 acres of barley. 44 acres of barley on the other side. 72 acres of oil seed rape on the other side. The plants are winter wheat. Winter barley and winter oil seed rape ready for winter. {MACHINERY He has 4 tractors, 1 of 55hp is used by the cowman for working around the building,and one of 82 hp which has 4 wheel drive,two big ones one of 115 and one of 125 hp which are both used for field work.1 combine harvester costs Â£34,000.
